create

protected java.lang.Object create(java.lang.Object memoryType,
                                  boolean rawAccess,
                                  long base,
                                  long size)
Used to actually create the physical memory accessor.
Parameters:
memoryType - Description of the memory type required.
rawAccess - Raw access only.
base - The physical address of the start of the region.
size - The size of the region in bytes.

getTypedMemoryBase

protected long getTypedMemoryBase(java.lang.Object memoryType,
                                  long size)
Get the base address of a range of memory of the correct type, that is at least the size specified.
Parameters:
memoryType - The type of memory to desired
size - The desired size of the memory range
